scripts.swagger-verify: npm run prestart && swagger project verify
scripts.swagger-edit: npm run prestart && swagger project edit
scripts.swagger-start: npm run prestart && swagger project start
scripts.swagger-start-mock: npm run prestart && swagger project start -m
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && babel --copy-files app.js -d dist && babel --copy-files api -d dist/api && babel --copy-files config -d dist/config
